page.title: 16Mayfield Yarns: The Cottages
page.content: Behind the Mill in Church Mayfield stand the original cottages. There are approx. 60 cottages in 5 terraces. Most of the cottages are now privately owned. Access is difficult. The cottages are on an "island" surrounded by the River Dove and the Henmore brook. There is no "through" traffic and the atmosphere is strangely quiet and anachronistic, the only noise being the constant sound of running water through the mill. It is a small industrial enclave surrounded by fields. The cottages seem untouched by time with very few obvious modernisations. The only 1980's touch being the preponderance of television aerials and parked cars. The area is still artisan, but one can imagine a change in future years.
